greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n/(largest perfect power divisor of n).
comment: Not all terms are squarefree numbers; for example, a(500) = 4.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) a(n)={my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if(ispower(d), m=max(m,d))); n/m} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 26 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 10 2018
